external_games.name: 我的变色龙女友My Chameleon Girlfriend

name: My Chameleon Girlfriend
storyline:
Pushy rich lady in love with me? Throw me a handbook of male morality?
Super star only loves me? To be so gentle with me?
this can't be a pipe dream...
In fact, the beautiful girl who loves me has a secret behind her...
I can't believe they all change! ?
I'm the slave of the rich lady, I'm the backup of the school girl?
Rich woman infatuated with all of me, only listen to my words, dead heart!
School flower love my brave strong struggle smart, vowed to steal me from the rich woman!
This is a private secret with the leading ladies, my chameleon girlfriend!
My lover is belly black big miss, my sidekick is everyone's idol.
Do you choose to dote on rich women or female stars?
summary: My Chameleon Girlfriend is Galgame, an AVG visual novel. Pushy rich lady in love with me? Throw me a handbook of male morality? Super star only loves me? dream? In fact, the beautiful girl who loves me has a secret behind her... Do you choose to dote on rich women or female stars?
